Member Function Documentation

virtual bool gaia::storage::OutputStream::checkError ( ) [virtual]

Returns true if this writer has encountered and suppressed an error.

Used by PrintStreams as an alternative to checked exceptions.

virtual void gaia::storage::OutputStream::close ( ) [virtual]

Closes this stream.

Implementations of this method should free any resources used by the stream. This implementation does nothing.

Reimplemented in gaia::storage::BufferedOutputStream, gaia::storage::ByteArrayOutputStream, gaia::storage::DataOutputStream, and gaia::storage::FileOutputStream.

virtual void gaia::storage::OutputStream::flush ( ) [virtual]

Flushes this stream.

Implementations of this method should ensure that any buffered data is written out. This implementation does nothing.

Reimplemented in gaia::storage::BufferedOutputStream, and gaia::storage::DataOutputStream.

OutputStream& gaia::storage::OutputStream::operator= ( const OutputStream &  o) [private]
virtual void gaia::storage::OutputStream::write ( const base::ByteArray &  buffer,
int32_t  offset,
int32_t  count 
) [virtual]

Writes count bytes from the byte array buffer starting at position offset to this stream.

Parameters:
bufferthe buffer to be written.
offsetthe start position in buffer from where to get bytes.
countthe number of bytes from buffer to write to this stream.

Reimplemented in gaia::storage::BufferedOutputStream, gaia::storage::DataOutputStream, and gaia::storage::FileOutputStream.

virtual void gaia::storage::OutputStream::write ( int32_t  oneByte) [pure virtual]

Writes a single byte to this stream.

Only the least significant byte of the integer oneByte is written to the stream.

Parameters:
oneBytethe byte to be written.

Implemented in gaia::storage::BufferedOutputStream, gaia::storage::DataOutputStream, and gaia::storage::FileOutputStream.
